comments.comment: Mama hoya hoya hitiya raththaran puthek mata mema veedio eken hamuvuna. Mama mage mulu hadavathinma, mage bokkenma numbata saha numbage kandayatamata jaya, sathuta, bava boga sampath, saubagya saha nopasubata veerya labevai adishtana karanava. Numbalata rata dinavala, nubalath dinana shakthiya thiyenava. Numbala vani daruvan siyaluma yahapath minissu, devivaru saha sathun visin rakinava. Mama Lankave vishvavidyalayaka hitapu upakulapathi kenek. Dan SANASA vishva vidyale upakulapathi. Mage durakathana ankaya 0774407766. Mata ape RATHTHARAN PUTHAGE ANKAYATH EVANNA. Theruvan Saranai. Suvapath Veva.
comments.author: nanayakkara karunarathne

comments.comment: I wholeheartedly wish you every success, happiness, prosperity and longevity. I am extremely proud of you. I was searching youths who could think of the people in this very beautiful country like you, but failed. I know there are many youths in this country who think and work like you. Today I found you through this video. I will give my fullest  support to you and your group. I was one of the former Vice-Chancellors and present Vice-Chancellor  of the SANASA Campus Kegalle. My contact number is 0774407766. Please contact me my golden son or RATHTHARAN PUTHE.
comments.author: nanayakkara karunarathne
